title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8138.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8138.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) US Route 20. US
Route 20 between the US Route 9 and 20 split and the Rensselaer county/Columbia
county line. (b) [Eff. until April
30, 1997, see also subd. (b) below.]
Route 7. Route 7 between Eighth Street in the City of Troy and Route
22. (b) [Eff. April 30, 1997, see
also subd. (b) above.] Route 7
(Hoosick Street) and Hoosick Road). Route 7 between Eighth Street and the New

York-Vermont state line in the City of Troy and the Towns of Brunswick, Pittstown and Hoosick. (c) US Route
9 and 20. US Route 9 and 20 between the City of Albany line and the US Route 20
split in the Town of Schodack. (e) US Route 4. US Route 4 (Mill Street, Vandenburg Avenue and North Greenbush

Road) between Route 378 (Burden Avenue) and Route 136 (Williams Road) in the

City of Troy and Town of North Greenbush. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8138.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
